page.title: 12HEALTH CENTRE,FRESHWATER
page.content: At the health centre there are five doctors - Dr. Reid, Dr. Thomson, Dr. Whitmore, Dr. Brooke, Dr. Sheard. They finished building the health centre in December, '84. Then it was opened on January 26th 1985, by Lord Mottistone. The health centre was designed to fit in with neighbouring houses. It was made of textured harvest milk bricks and blue grey roofing slates. Twenty-five people are working there and there are twenty-five rooms. The aim to promote co-operation and a team work between doctors, district nurses and health visitors. Pedestrian access from Queens Road and Brookside Road.
